title: na.exe Version Fix - RESOLVED
details:
## RESOLVED: na.exe Version Issue

**Problem**: na.exe --version was showing "1.0.0-beta" instead of CI build version

**Root Causes Identified**:
1. InformationalVersion property was not being set during CI publish step
2. Hardcoded version attributes in AssemblyInfo.cs were overriding build-time properties
3. GenerateAssemblyInfo was disabled, preventing MSBuild property overrides

**Solutions Implemented**:
1. Added /p:InformationalVersion=%CI_VERSION% to both build and publish steps in ci-windows.yml
2. Removed hardcoded version attributes from src/c-sharp/NotebookAutomation.Cli/Properties/AssemblyInfo.cs
3. Set <GenerateAssemblyInfo>true</GenerateAssemblyInfo> in NotebookAutomation.Cli.csproj
4. Fixed YAML and PowerShell formatting issues in CI workflow
5. Moved formatting verification earlier in CI to fail fast
6. Updated download script to use relative paths and copy config directory

**Verification**:
- Local build: 1.0.0-development+<git-hash>
- CI build: 1.0.526.62+65512f4619aacbac86357fc6e6051f2c61d20d30
- Downloaded CI artifact working correctly
- CLI help and other commands functional

**Status**: âœ… COMPLETED - All objectives achieved
